Articles.Content: You know those small wheels, they are called GearSmall in the files, well they just fall into the ground whenever I use them. Same with the non-retractable landing gears. Is it just my computer? Please help.
Are you running the 1.1.1 patch? One of the changes was intended to adress that specifically.

4 hours ago, SmileyFace123 said:

You know those small wheels, they are called GearSmall in the files, well they just fall into the ground whenever I use them. Same with the non-retractable landing gears. Is it just my computer? Please help.

Right click the part, if it says "Wheel Blocked: Yes" at the top of the menu, then the wheel is too close to other parts, and is disabling. Move it further away from other parts.
